document_data.name: Taunt
document_data.Effects:
When ''taunt'' was cast, the affected creature became hostile and would attempt to attack the caster.

When used in conjunction with a ''[[ventriloquism]]'' spell, the creatures might attack the apparent source, depending upon their intelligence, a leader's presence, and so on.
document_data.Components: The spell required [[Verbal component|verbal]], [[Somatic component|somatic]], and [[material component]]s. The material component was a slug, which was hurled at the creatures.
document_data.History: The spell was attributed to [[Arcanist|Netherese arcanist]] [[Dace (arcanist)|Dace]], in [[-1839 DR|âˆ’1839 DR]], originally called ''Dace's taunting''.
